participant_1.background: i enjoy being around people. i like to workout a a times a week. i volunteer in a homeless shelter. in my spare time i do volunteer work. i am a professional wrestler.

participant_2.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. my brother is older than me. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.
